DOC.brief_summary: The investigator hypothesize pre-arrival instruction would increase likelihood bystander perform Cardiopulmonary Resuscitation ( CPR ) .
DOC.brief_title: Pre-arrival Instructions Effect Bystander Cardiopulmonary Resuscitation ( CPR ) .
DOC.detailed_description: The City Milwaukee surround community combine form Milwaukee County cover 241 square mile serve approximately 959,521 people . Milwaukee County include 19 separate municipality . Community demographic characteristic remain largely stable past decade . The study take place Milwaukee County 2009 - 2013 community provide Cardiopulmonary Resuscitation ( CPR ) pre-arrival instruction : West Allis Oak Creek . In Milwaukee County Basic Live Support ( BLS ) shall start patient cardiac arrest exception victim : decapitation ; rigor mortis ; evidence tissue decomposition ; dependent lividity ; presence valid Do-Not-Resuscitate ( DNR ) Physician Orders Life-Sustaining Treatment ( POLST ) ; fire victim full thickness burn 90 % great body surface area ; hypothermic patient sign frozen tissue , rigid airway , ice formation mouth , chest noncompliant Cardiopulmonary Resuscitation ( CPR ) . The system standard : Cardiopulmonary Resuscitation ( CPR ) provide whenever patient pulseless ; compression least 100/minute ; hand chest 75 % time ; minimum compression depth 2 inch adults 75 % time . Therefore , investigator analyze data assess Cardiopulmonary Resuscitation ( CPR ) pre-arrival instruction may affect probability receive bystander Cardiopulmonary Resuscitation ( CPR ) .
DOC.criteria: Patients 21 year old old Presumed cardiac origin indicate Milwaukee County Emergency Medical Services ( MCEMS ) report NonEmergency Medical Services ( EMS ) witness arrest Patients young 21 year old Patients `` obviously dead '' ( decomposition , rigor mortis , decapitation , ) Trauma victim , include hang burn Patients cardiac arrest clearly noncardiac origin include drug overdose , carbon monoxide poisoning , drown , exsanguination , electrocution , asphyxia , hypoxia related respiratory disease , cerebrovascular accident document terminal illness Patients determine donotresuscitate ( DNR ) upon arrival Emergency Medical Services ( EMS ) provider Cardiopulmonary Resuscitation ( CPR ) someone Emergency Medical Services ( EMS ) train first responder health care provider predetermine duty provide care .
